revised_title: The Growth and Oxidation Capabilities of Nitroso-Bacterium
tldr: The author conducted experiments to understand the growth and oxidation capabilities of nitroso-bacterium. They discovered that the bacterium can grow in the presence of organic matter and can convert ammonia into nitrous acid. The author also found that the nitroso-bacterium can be isolated using various media, such as silica, gelatine, and agar. This research challenges previous beliefs about the nitroso-bacterium's limitations in growing on ordinary media.
